languages.text: "П-почему вместо Дворца Атласа ксеноские руины? Отчего это место пропитано непроглядным черным туманом? Я... я в нем задыхаюсь..." {n}Кассия хватается за нагрудник в области Атласа, голос ослаб и дрожит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "П-почему вместо Дворца Атласа ксеноские руины? Отчего это место пропитано непроглядным черным туманом? Я... я в нем задыхаюсь..." {n}Кассия хватается за нагрудник в области Атласа, голос ослаб и дрожит.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate near where her Atlas is, her voice feeble and trembling.{/n}
languages.original_text: "П-почему вместо Дворца Атласа ксеноские руины? Отчего это место пропитано непроглядным черным туманом? Я... я в нем задыхаюсь..." {n}Кассия хватается за нагрудник в области Атласа, голос ослаб и дрожит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is, her voice quivering weakly.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is, her voice quivering weakly.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I-m... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is, her voice all feeble and wobbly.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I-m... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate around where her Atlas is, her voice all feeble and wobbly.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate near where her Atlas is, her voice feeble and trembling.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate near where her Atlas is, her voice feeble and trembling.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「なぜ…異種族の遺構がアトラスの宮殿に？どうしてこの宮殿は真っ黒な霧で包まれているの？あ、あたくし…息が…」{n}カシアはアトラスのあたりを胸当て越しに握る。その声は弱り切って震えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate near where her Atlas is, her voice feeble and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ…異種族の遺構がアトラスの宮殿に？どうしてこの宮殿は真っ黒な霧で包まれているの？あ、あたくし…息が…」{n}カシアはアトラスのあたりを胸当て越しに握る。その声は弱り切って震えている。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “为什么……为什么本该是圣仪神殿的地方，却是异形的废墟？为什么这里会有一层无法穿透的黑雾？我……我……我要窒息了……”{n}卡西娅紧紧地握着圣仪的位置，微弱的声音不住地颤抖。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate near where her Atlas is, her voice feeble and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “为什么……为什么本该是圣仪神殿的地方，却是异形的废墟？为什么这里会有一层无法穿透的黑雾？我……我……我要窒息了……”{n}卡西娅紧紧地握着圣仪的位置，微弱的声音不住地颤抖。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Pourquoi... pourquoi y a-t-il des ruines xénos à la place du palais de l'Atlas ? Pourquoi ce lieu est-il recouvert d'un brouillard noir impénétrable ? Je... j'étouffe... » {n}La voix fébrile, Cassia agrippe sa cuirasse au niveau de l'Atlas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate near where her Atlas is, her voice feeble and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi... pourquoi y a-t-il des ruines xénos à la place du palais de l'Atlas ? Pourquoi ce lieu est-il recouvert d'un brouillard noir impénétrable ? Je... J'étouffe... » {n}La voix fébrile, Cassia agrippe sa cuirasse au niveau de l'Atlas.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Por qué...? ¿Por qué hay ruinas xenos donde debería alzarse el palacio del Atlas? ¿Por qué está cubierto este lugar de una niebla negra e impenetrable? Me... me... ahogo...». {n}Cassia aferra su coraza, donde se encuentra su Atlas, y su voz es débil y temblorosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate near where her Atlas is, her voice feeble and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué...? ¿Por qué hay ruinas xenos donde debería alzarse el palacio del Atlas? ¿Por qué está cubierto este lugar de una niebla negra e impenetrable? Me... me... ahogo...». {n}Cassia aferra su coraza, donde se encuentra su Atlas, y su voz es débil e insegura.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Warum ... warum stehen dort, wo der Palast des Atlas stehen sollte, Xenos-Ruinen? Warum ist hier alles in einen undurchdringlichen schwarzen Nebel getaucht? Ich ... ich ... ersticke ..." {n}Cassia greift sich an die Brustplatte, wo ihr Atlas eingesetzt ist. Ihre Stimme ist schwach und zittrig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate near where her Atlas is, her voice feeble and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Warum ... warum stehen dort, wo der Palast des Atlas stehen sollte, Xenos-Ruinen? Warum ist hier alles in einen undurchdringlichen schwarzen Nebel getaucht? Ich ... ich ... ersticke ..." {n}Cassia greift sich an die Brustplatte, wo ihr Atlas eingesetzt ist. Ihre Stimme ist schwach und zittrig.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Neden... Atlas Sarayı'nın olması gereken yerde neden zeno harabeleri var? Burası neden içinden geçilmesi imkânsız, kara bir sisle kaplı? Ben... Nefes alamıyorum." {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın olduğu yerin yanını sıkıca tutuyor. Sesi cılız ve titrek çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why... why are there xenos ruins where the Palace of the Atlas should be? Why is this place coated in an impenetrable black mist? I... I'm... suffocating..." {n}Cassia clutches her breastplate near where her Atlas is, her voice feeble and trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Neden... Atlas Sarayı'nın olması gereken yerde neden zeno harabeleri var? Burası neden İçinden geçilmesi imkânsız, kara bir sisle kaplı? Ben... Nefes alamıyorum..." {n}Cassia, göğüs zırhında Atlas'ın olduğu yerin yanını sıkıca tutuyor. Sesi cılız ve titrek çıkıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
